skills.name: HEARTBREAK
desc: • Deals 1 hit of physical damage and 1 hit of true damage to a single target.
• Removes Damage Type Invulnerability and Invincibility Effects from the target.
• 50% Chance to Sleep the target for 2 turns.
• This attack does not wake targets that are asleep.

skills.name: NEVERMORE
desc: • Revive a random dead ally with full HP.
• Grant Counter Strike and Echo to all allies for 2 turns.
• Instantly grant an Extra Turn to self and revived ally.

skills.name: EMINENCE
desc: Immune to Stun. Gains Revenge for the duration of battle. Grant a Damage Reduction Shield to each ally below 50% HP at the start of your turn for the duration of the battle.
